summary: A little bit of something for everyone.  Based on JimmyPotatoPage's presets.  Currently available individually or merged.  UNP family body styles.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#ff0000][size=6][b][u]LAVELLAN'S FOLLOWERS[/u][/b][/size][/color]

[i]Based on JimmyPotatoPage's Racemenu Preset Available [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81631/?]Here[/url]
Permission granted for follower creation by [/i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/32738900/?][i]JimmyPotatoPage[/i]
[/url]
[img]https://s5.postimg.org/qqebfcqyv/1200x334_With_Text_Resized.jpg[/img]

[youtube]dtdKP3XgKmA[/youtube]
[/font][/center][center][font=Verdana][img]https://s5.postimg.org/kwe5vkyrr/Info.png[/img]
[img]https://s5.postimg.org/7tdridh8n/Tunimu1.jpg[/img][img]https://s5.postimg.org/5neva4oef/Rosellien1.jpg[/img]
[img]https://s5.postimg.org/wheyvm3k7/Lavellan1.jpg[/img][img]https://s5.postimg.org/826quk4nb/Oletsha1.jpg[/img]
[img]https://s5.postimg.org/ls1a3crrb/Anngela1.jpg[/img][img]https://s5.postimg.org/idj3n7wcn/Raelea1.jpg[/img]
[img]https://s5.postimg.org/swj3cdz0n/Kariussa1.jpg[/img]

Tunimu - Dark Elf Necromancer; Located at New Gnisis Cornerclub, Windhelm
Rosellien - Breton Destruction Mage; Located at Frozen Hearth, Winterhold
Lavellan - Wood Elf Archer; Located at Drunken Huntsman, Whiterun
Oletsha - Redguard Dual Wield Scimitars; Located at Four Shields Tavern, Dragonbridge
Anngela - Nord One-Handed; Located at Palace of the Kings, Windhelm
Raelea - Imperial Dual Wield Daggers; Located at Castle Dour, Solitude
Kariussa - High Elf Destruction Magic; Located at Frost Fruit Inn, Rorikstead

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/w10qmv6vb/All1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/p0jq1tk3r/Requirements.png[/img]
Dawnguard
BBP/TBBP Compatible Skeleton
[img]https://s5.postimg.org/x4ru6k6iv/Recommended.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Facelight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75951/?]Fix Lip Sync
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE
[img]https://s5.postimg.org/qn8xn1w5j/KnownIssues.png[/img]
[/url]Some ENBs may show slight skin discoloration between body and head

Armor may clip in certain poses/positions.

Some armor is designed to be worn together.  You may experience seams when doing otherwise.

The Merged Pack is not optimized in its creation therefore would not recommend traveling
with too many of the followers at the same time.

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/fz56o7m6f/Installation.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/x7bptea6f/Uninstall.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/70kof7h1j/Q&A.png[/img]
[/url]Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  Will you release other body styles?
A:  No immediate plans to do so
A:  A quick internet search will give instruction on swapping bodies.

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.
